title: Textile, "Wasserorgel", 1910–12
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Pattern of striped arches and concentric dots closely spaces. (a) purple, lavender, puce, and red on dark brown ground; (b) ivory, yellow, dark and light gray on purple ground; (c) black and white on black ground.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product
